name: Witch Chase (Ludum Dare #48)
description:
How to play:

  • ←→↓↑: Move
  • SHIFT: Slow down

Reach the witch as close as possible to hit her and score a point.

Dodge the bullets or you'll get a Game Over.

A submission for Ludum Dare #48 with the Theme "Deeper and Deeper"
→ Go to the ldjam.com page
